title: Pythagoras in 3D
brief_description: Illustrates a celebrated proof of Pythagoras’s theorem by Tarbit of Baghdad in the ninth century and by Leonardo da Vinci in the fifteenth century. Considers some cases of calculation by Pythagoras’s rule, arising from three-dimensional situations.
